name: hawker
description: A marketplace where users can buy or sell items

scripts.start: concurrently "cd Develop/server && npm run start" "cd Develop/client && npm start"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd Develop/server && npm run watch" "cd Develop/client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd Develop/client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.eslint: cd Develop/client && npm run eslint && cd ../server && npm run eslint

author: Nicholas Nolen, Craig Jensen, Jide Ogunbanjo, Nigel Loch, Samantha Chavez, Sarah Wylie
